instructions: If you haven't already, open WhatsApp on your iPhone. Tap the Chats icon at the bottom of the screen. Tap the chat you want to archive and slide the message to the left, then tap Archive . The chat will be archived and removed from the Chats view.

Open WhatsApp on your Android. Tap the Chats tab, then tap and hold the chat you want to archive until the green bubble appears. Tap the three vertical dots in the top right corner, then tap Archive chat . This will send the chat to the Archived location.
